title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2520.8 - Amendment or revocation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2520.8 - Amendment or revocation

State Regulations

Any provision of this Code may be amended or revoked at
any time in accordance with the procedure set forth in chapter 888 of the Laws
of New York for the year 1985, or as otherwise provided by the State

Administrative Procedure Act. However, where a law requires a different rule
than set forth in any provision of this Code, which may be implemented in the
absence of regulation, DHCR shall follow such law notwithstanding that such
conflicting code provision has not yet been amended or
revoked. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

2520.8

New

York State Register November 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 45, eff. 11/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
